attributes.action: penalise parents who have children they cannot afford.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For example, many times I have seen people who live in council funded housing complain about their house being too small and have been waiting to be rehoused for many many years, yet have a newborn child and other children not much older.
 Fines and imprisonment would not be suitable for this irresponsible behaviour as this would harm the child, but compulsary community service could be used which would also create a better environment for the child to develop.
